extDescription.message: Open multiple URLs instantly, extract URLs from text, and more.

helpPopoverLazyloadSwitch.message: A new tab will not be created until the current tab is fully loaded.
helpPopoverLazyloadSwitch.description: Help popover text for the 'Open One-by-One' switch

labelPasteHtmlSwitch.description: Label for the 'Paste as HTML' switch

helpPopoverPasteHtmlSwitch.message: Allows you to paste text as HTML, including all links and tags. You can easily extract all the links afterward.
helpPopoverPasteHtmlSwitch.description: Help popover text for the 'Paste as HTML' switch

placeholderTextarea.message: Enter a list of links or text containing links

tooltipTitleParseTabsButton.description: Tooltip title for the 'Parse Tabs' button

tooltipDescriptionParseTabsButton.message: Parse links from all tabs opened in the current window
tooltipDescriptionParseTabsButton.description: Tooltip description for the 'Parse Tabs' button

tooltipTitleOpenAllButton.description: Tooltip title for the 'Open All' button

tooltipDescriptionOpenAllButton.message: Finds the links and opens them in new tabs
tooltipDescriptionOpenAllButton.description: Tooltip description for the 'Open All' button

tooltipTitleLinksOnlyButton.description: Tooltip title for the 'Links Only' button

tooltipDescriptionLinksOnlyButton.message: Finds all links within the entered text, extracts them, and creates a list.
tooltipDescriptionLinksOnlyButton.description: Tooltip description for the 'Links Only' button

errorNoContentToExtract.description: Validation error message for no content to extract

errorEmptyInput.message: Please paste a list of links or text containing links
errorEmptyInput.description: Validation error message for empty input

errorNoValidLinksFound.message: No valid links found in the text
errorNoValidLinksFound.description: Validation error message for no valid links found

subjectBugReport.message: A new bug discovered in Omneelinq!

labelReportBugButton.description: Label for the 'Report a Bug' button
